amendment.description: An amendment numbered 26 printed in House Report 115-679 to direct the Secretary to designate, among existing USDA staff, a Beginning Farmer and Rancher (BFR) Coordinator in each state, without associated cost.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 26 printed in House Report 115-679 to direct the Secretary to designate, among existing USDA staff, a Beginning Farmer and Rancher (BFR) Coordinator in each state, without associated cost.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Costello (PA) amendment (A043) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Costello (PA) amendment (A043) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A043) offered by Mr. Costello (PA).
